New Records: Stephen Curry made all 8 of his 3-point attempts
Key Match Events: Stephen Curry had 13 points in the third, including back-to-back deep 3s
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors shot 56% (22 of 39) from 3-point range and 61% from the field overall
Others: Golden State led 35-19 after the first quarter and extended a 16-point halftime lead to 25 at the end of the third quarter
Joel Embiid led the Sixers with 28 points and 14 rebounds
